Text.Page:
The argons hit one of our supply convoys and destroyed an entire shipment of rations. Our fighters won't last long without supplies.

Get the emergency rations from {@LinkCreature:248#3003#Vikhonul} and resupply those troops!

I don't have to tell a veteran like you how vital it is to keep up your strength on the battlefield.

Here, take these emergency rations out to our troops.

There's no time to waste. Get those rations to the soldiers who need them.

Hungry soldiers are vulnerable soldiers.

Oh, thank the gods!

I wondered if I'd have to learn what argon tasted like.

Never thought I'd be so happy to see a package of hardtack.

Thanks, .

Thanks for not forgetting about us.

There's no feeling worse than being forgotten.
Well, it's not a spiced roast, but I'm damned glad to get it. Thanks!
The Shariar never forgets their own. Thanks for this!

We'll be all right now, thanks to you.

We can stretch these rations out until the regular supply run reaches us.
Thanks for taking care of that little emergency, <PCNAME>. The last thing we need are starving soldiers.
